code: import axios from"axios";import{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Form=()=>{const[firstName,setFirstName]=useState("");const[lastName,setLastName]=useState("");const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const submitForm=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{await axios.post("http://localhost:8080",{firstName,lastName,email});alert("Form submitted successfully");}catch(error){console.error(error);alert("Error submitting form");}setFirstName("");setLastName("");setEmail("");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("form",{onSubmit:submitForm,className:"container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{className:"heading-h2",children:["Stay Updated with Our Latest",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{})," Jokes."]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"form-paragraph",children:"Subscribe to our newsletter and never miss a joke! Get the funniest programming jokes delivered straight to your inbox."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"inputs",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"first-name",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:firstName,onChange:e=>setFirstName(e.target.value),type:"text",name:"first-name",id:"first-name",placeholder:"First Name"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"last-name",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:lastName,onChange:e=>setLastName(e.target.value),type:"text",name:"last-name",id:"last-name",placeholder:"Last Name"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"email",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),type:"email",name:"emaile",id:"email",placeholder:"Email"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Stay Updated"})]})]})});};export default Form;
